price: Itegeko rya Allah (ryo kuza kw’imperuka) riregereje, bityo ntimuryihutishe. Ubutagatifu ni ubwe kandi nta ho ahuriye n’ibyo bamubangikanya na byo.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
